trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that can be written to and updated.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que podem ser escritos e atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Use the WriteableBitmap class to update and render a bitmap on a per-frame basis.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a classe de WriteableBitmap para atualizar e compor um mapa de bits numa base por moldura.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for generating algorithmic content, such as a fractal image, and for data visualization, such as a music visualizer.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil para gerar o conteúdo usam, tal como uma imagem de fractal e para visualização de dados, tais como um Visualizador de música.

trans-unit.source: The WriteableBitmap class uses two buffers.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WriteableBitmap utiliza dois memórias intermédias.

trans-unit.source: The *back buffer* is allocated in system memory and accumulates content that is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: O *memória intermédia de back-* é atribuído na memória de sistema e acumula conteúdo que não é atualmente apresentado.

trans-unit.source: The *front buffer* is allocated in system memory and contains the content that is currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: O *memória intermédia de front-* é atribuído na memória de sistema e contém o conteúdo que está atualmente apresentado.

trans-unit.source: The rendering system copies the front buffer to video memory for display.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de composição copia a memória intermédia de front-a memória de vídeo para apresentação.

trans-unit.source: Two threads use these buffers.
trans-unit.target: Dois threads utilizam estes memórias intermédias.

trans-unit.source: The *user interface (UI) thread* generates the UI but does not present it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: O *thread de interface (IU) do utilizador* gera a IU, mas não a apresentar para o ecrã.

trans-unit.source: The UI thread responds to user input, timers, and other events.
trans-unit.target: O thread de IU responde a intervenção do utilizador, os temporizadores e outros eventos.

trans-unit.source: An application can have multiple UI threads.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação pode ter vários threads de IU.

trans-unit.source: The *render thread* composes and renders changes from the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: O *thread de composição* composes e apresenta-alteração a partir do thread da IU.

trans-unit.source: There is only one render thread per application.
trans-unit.target: Não há compor apenas um thread por aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The UI thread writes content to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: O thread de IU escreve o conteúdo da memória intermédia de back.

trans-unit.source: The render thread reads content from the front buffer and copies it to video memory.
trans-unit.target: O thread de composição lê conteúdo da memória intermédia front e copia-o para a memória de vídeo.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the back buffer are tracked with changed rectangular regions.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na memória intermédia de back-são registadas com regiões retangular foi alteradas.

trans-unit.source: Call one of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A> overloads to update and display content in the back buffer automatically.
trans-unit.target: Chamar uma do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A>sobrecargas para atualizar e apresentar conteúdo na memória intermédia de back-automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A>

trans-unit.source: For greater control over updates, and for multi-threaded access to the back buffer, use the following workflow.
trans-unit.target: Para maior controlo sobre atualizações e para o acesso de vários threads na memória intermédia de back-, utilize o seguinte fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> method to reserve the back buffer for updates.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>método para a memória intermédia back para atualizações de reserva.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Obtain a pointer to the back buffer by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.BackBuffer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter um ponteiro para a memória intermédia de back-acedendo a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.BackBuffer%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.BackBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Write changes to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Escreva alterações para a memória intermédia back.

trans-unit.source: Other threads may write changes to the back buffer when the WriteableBitmap is locked.
trans-unit.target: Outros threads podem escrever alterações para a memória intermédia de back-quando o WriteableBitmap está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A> method to indicate areas that have changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>método para indicar áreas que tenham sido alterados.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> method to release the back buffer and allow presentation to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>método para a memória intermédia de fundo da versão e permitir a apresentação para o ecrã.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: When updates are sent to the rendering thread, the rendering thread copies the changed rectangles from the back buffer to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando as atualizações são enviadas para o thread de composição, o thread de composição copia os retângulos alterados da memória intermédia de back-na memória intermédia de front.

trans-unit.source: The rendering system controls this exchange to avoid deadlocks and redraw artifacts, such as "tearing".
trans-unit.target: O sistema de composição controla este exchange para evitar a impasses e redesenhar artefactos, tais como ", é necessário remover".

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref> class using the given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref> classe com o fornecido <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%29> constructor is preferred over using this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%29>construtor é preferencial relativamente à utilização este construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Double%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%29>

trans-unit.source: If `source` does not use a natively supported bitmap format, format conversions are applied for each frame update, which reduces performance.
trans-unit.target: Se `source` não utiliza um formato de mapa de bits nativamente suportados, o formato conversões são aplicadas para cada atualização de moldura, o que reduz o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> to use for initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> a utilizar para a inicialização.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref> classe com os parâmetros especificados.

trans-unit.source: The preferred values for `pixelFormat` are <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Bgr32%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores preferenciais para `pixelFormat` são <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Bgr32%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Bgr32%2A>

trans-unit.source: These formats are natively supported and do not require a format conversion.
trans-unit.target: Estes formatos são suportados nativamente e não necessitam de uma conversão de formato.

trans-unit.source: Other `pixelFormat` values require a format conversion for each frame update, which reduces performance.
trans-unit.target: Outros `pixelFormat` valores necessitam de uma conversão de formato para cada atualização de moldura, o que reduz o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The desired width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A largura pretendida do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The desired height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A altura pretendida do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O horizontal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The vertical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](../Token/TLA%23tla_dpi_md.md)] of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Vertical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](../Token/TLA%23tla_dpi_md.md)] do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref> do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref> of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"> </xref> do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the area of the bitmap that changed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a área do mapa de bits que foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: Call the AddDirtyRect method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método AddDirtyRect para indicar as alterações de código tem a memória intermédia de back.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method multiple times, the changed areas are accumulated in a sufficient, but not necessarily minimal, representation.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar este método várias vezes, são acumuladas áreas de alteração numa representação suficiente, mas não necessariamente mínima.

trans-unit.source: For efficiency, only the areas that are marked as dirty are guaranteed to be copied forward to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: Para uma eficiência, a ser copiado reencaminhar para a memória intermédia de front-garantidas apenas as áreas que estão marcadas como desatualizados.

trans-unit.source: However, any portion of the bitmap may be copied forward, so you must ensure that the entire back buffer is always valid.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, qualquer parte do mapa de bits pode ser copiado, pelo que tem de garantir que o back-a memória intermédia completa sempre é válida.

trans-unit.source: Call the AddDirtyRect method only between calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> methods, as described in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> class remarks.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método AddDirtyRect apenas entre chamadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>métodos, conforme descrito no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>classe observações.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref> representing the area that changed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"> </xref> que representa a área que foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: Dimensions are in pixels.
trans-unit.target: As dimensões são em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: The bitmap has not been locked by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock*> methods.
trans-unit.target: O mapa de bits não tiver sido bloqueado por uma chamada para o <> </> *> ou <> </> *> métodos.

trans-unit.source: dirtyRect falls outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: dirtyRectestá fora dos limites do .

trans-unit.source: Gets a pointer to the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um ponteiro para a memória intermédia back.

trans-unit.source: The back buffer contains the bitmap contents in the pixel format requested by the user.
trans-unit.target: A memória intermédia de back-contém o conteúdo do mapa de bits no formato de pixel pedidas pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Update the back buffer only between calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Atualizar a memória intermédia de back-apenas entre chamadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not follow the Lock/Unlock workflow described in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> class remarks, undefined behaviors, such as tearing, can occur.
trans-unit.target: Se não siga o fluxo de trabalho de bloquear/desbloquear descrito a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>observações de classe, indefinidos comportamentos, como, é necessário remover, podem ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>

trans-unit.source: The address of the back buffer does not change.
trans-unit.target: Não alterar o endereço da memória intermédia anterior.

trans-unit.source: Thread Safety You can pass the BackBuffer pointer to external components and other threads for processing, but if you do, you must provide you own thread coordination.
trans-unit.target: Thread segurança pode passar o ponteiro BackBuffer para componentes externos e outros threads de processamento, mas se o fizer, é necessário fornecer coordenação de thread próprio.

trans-unit.source: In particular, you must ensure that the UI thread specifies changed areas by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A> method, and that the UI thread unlocks the buffer by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Em particular, tem de garantir que o thread de IU Especifica áreas alteradas ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>método e que o thread de IU desbloqueia a memória intermédia ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that points to the base address of the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IntPtr>que aponta para o endereço base da memória intermédia back.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of bytes in a single row of pixel data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o número de bytes de uma única linha de dados de pixel.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the number of bytes in a single row of pixel data.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica o número de bytes de uma única linha de dados de pixel.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref>, efetuar cópias profundas de valores deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Quando copiar propriedades de dependência, este método copia enlaces de referências e os dados de recursos (mas já não poderão resolver), mas não animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> objeto, tornando profundas cópias dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: As referências de recurso, enlaces de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Reserves the back buffer for updates.
trans-unit.target: Reserva-se a memória intermédia back para atualizações.

trans-unit.source: The Lock method increments the lock count.
trans-unit.target: O método Lock incrementa a contagem de bloqueio.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> is locked, the rendering system does not send updates until the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> is fully unlocked by calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>está bloqueado, o sistema de composição não enviar atualizações até o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>totalmente está desbloqueado por chamadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Lock method to support multi-threaded implementations.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o método Lock para suportar implementações de vários threads.

trans-unit.source: In these scenarios, the UI thread locks the bitmap and exposes the back buffer to other threads.
trans-unit.target: Nestes cenários, o thread de IU bloqueia o mapa de bits e expõe a memória intermédia back para outros threads.

trans-unit.source: When the worker thread has finished a frame, the UI thread adds changed rectangles and unlocks the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando o thread de trabalho foi concluído um intervalo, o thread de IU adiciona retângulos alterados e desbloqueia a memória intermédia.

trans-unit.source: The UI thread can block when the render thread acquires a lock on the back buffer to copy it forward to the front buffer.
trans-unit.target: O thread de IU pode bloquear quando o thread de composição adquire um bloqueio na memória intermédia back copia reencaminhar na memória intermédia de front.

trans-unit.source: If the latency from this block is too long, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock%2A> method to wait for a short time and then unblock the UI thread to perform other tasks while the back buffer is locked.
trans-unit.target: Se a latência deste bloco é demasiado longa, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock%2A>método para aguardar por um curto período de tempo e, em seguida, desbloquear o thread de IU para efetuar outras tarefas enquanto a memória intermédia de back-está bloqueada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to lock the bitmap, waiting for no longer than the specified length of time.
trans-unit.target: As tentativas para bloquear o mapa de bits, aguardar já não é que o período de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: When a lock is acquired, the behavior of the TryLock method is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando um bloqueio é obtido, o comportamento do método TryLock é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> that represents the length of time to wait.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"> </xref> que representa o período de tempo de espera.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 0 devolve imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*> blocks indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*>Bloquear indefinidamente.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the lock was acquired; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o bloqueio foi adquirido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: timeout is set to .
trans-unit.target: timeoutestá definido como .

trans-unit.source: Releases the back buffer to make it available for display.
trans-unit.target: Versões a memória intermédia back para disponibilizá-lo para apresentação.

trans-unit.source: The Unlock method decrements the lock count.
trans-unit.target: A é decrementada método de desbloqueio do bloqueio de contagem.

trans-unit.source: When the lock count reaches 0, a render pass is requested if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Quando a contagem de bloqueio atinge 0, uma passagem de composição é pedida se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>método foi chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.AddDirtyRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The bitmap has not been locked by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.TryLock*> methods.
trans-unit.target: O mapa de bits não tiver sido bloqueado por uma chamada para o <> </> *> ou <> </> *> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Updates the pixels in the specified region of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os pixels na região especificada do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overloads are preferred over using this method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>sobrecargas são preferenciais relativamente à utilização deste método.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In partial trust, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Em confiança parcial, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: The rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref> to update.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref> para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: The pixel array used to update the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de pixel utilizada para atualizar o mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The stride of the update region in `pixels`.
trans-unit.target: Stride da região de atualização no `pixels`.

trans-unit.source: The input buffer offset.
trans-unit.target: O desvio da memória intermédia de entrada.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais das seguintes condições são VERDADEIRO.

trans-unit.source: sourceRect falls outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: sourceRectestá fora dos limites do .

trans-unit.source: stride < 1 offset < 0
trans-unit.target: stride < 1 offset < 0

trans-unit.source: pixels is .
trans-unit.target: pixelsis .

trans-unit.source: pixels has a rank other than 1 or 2, or its length is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: pixelstem uma classificação diferente de 1 ou 2, ou o comprimento é inferior ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: Updates the pixels in the specified region of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os pixels na região especificada do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overloads are preferred over using this method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>sobrecargas são preferenciais relativamente à utilização deste método.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.IntPtr%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In partial trust, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Em confiança parcial, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: The rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"></xref> to update.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap"> </xref> para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: The input buffer used to update the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A memória intermédia de entrada utilizada para atualizar o mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The size of the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da memória intermédia de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The stride of the update region in `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: Stride da região de atualização no `buffer`.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais das seguintes condições são VERDADEIRO.

trans-unit.source: sourceRect falls outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: sourceRectestá fora dos limites do .

trans-unit.source: bufferSize < 1 stride < 1
trans-unit.target: bufferSize < 1 stride < 1

trans-unit.source: buffer is .
trans-unit.target: bufferis .

trans-unit.source: Updates the pixels in the specified region of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os pixels na região especificada do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> automatically with the contents of `sourceBuffer`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A>método para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>automaticamente com o conteúdo do `sourceBuffer`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is the equivalent of using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> workflow described in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> class remarks.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método é o equivalente a utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>fluxo de trabalho descrito a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>classe observações.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use this overload in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Utilizar esta sobrecarga em confiança parcial.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle in `sourceBuffer` to copy.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo em `sourceBuffer` para copiar.

trans-unit.source: The input buffer used to update the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A memória intermédia de entrada utilizada para atualizar o mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The stride of the input buffer, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Stride da memória intermédia, em bytes.

trans-unit.source: The destination x-coordinate of the left-most pixel in the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: O destino-coordenada x do pixel mais à esquerda na memória intermédia de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The destination y-coordinate of the top-most pixel in the back buffer.
trans-unit.target: O destino-coordenada y do pixel mais alto na memória intermédia de fundo.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following conditions is true.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais das seguintes condições são VERDADEIRO.

trans-unit.source: sourceRect falls outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: sourceRectestá fora dos limites do .

trans-unit.source: destinationX or destinationY is outside the bounds of the .
trans-unit.target: destinationXou destinationY está fora dos limites do .

trans-unit.source: sourceBufferStride < 1
trans-unit.target: sourceBufferStride < 1

trans-unit.source: sourceBuffer is .
trans-unit.target: sourceBufferis .

trans-unit.source: sourceBuffer has a rank other than 1 or 2, or its length is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: sourceBuffertem uma classificação diferente de 1 ou 2, ou o comprimento é inferior ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: Updates the pixels in the specified region of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os pixels na região especificada do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: Call the WritePixels method to update the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> automatically with the contents of `sourceBuffer`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método WritePixels para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>automaticamente com o conteúdo do `sourceBuffer`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is the equivalent of using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> workflow described in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> class remarks.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método é o equivalente a utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A>fluxo de trabalho descrito a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap>classe observações.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Unlock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In partial trust, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Em confiança parcial, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WriteableBitmap.WritePixels%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>
